Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

function waitForChild(parent, instance) while parent:FindFirstChild(instance) == nil do print("Waiting on .. ", instance) wait() end end
local Tool = script.Parent local Dragon = Tool.Handle
local prevHealth = 100
local damage = 17
local healthConnect
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local attacking
Tool.Enabled = true
local connection
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local fireball = Instance.new("Part") fireball.FormFactor = 3 fireball.Shape = "Ball" fireball.Size = Vector3.new(1.1, 1.1, 1.1) fireball.CanCollide = false fireball.Transparency = 0.0
local bullet = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") bullet.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=57810032" bullet.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=57809568" bullet.Parent = fireball bullet.Scale = Vector3.new(2.5, 2.5, 2.5)
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = fireball fire.Color = Color3.new(244/255, 164/255, 96/255) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(244/255, 164/255, 96/255)
waitForChild(Dragon, "LeftWing") waitForChild(Dragon, "RightWing") waitForChild(Dragon, "LeftWingWeld") waitForChild(Dragon, "RightWingWeld") waitForChild(Dragon, "LeftLegWeld") waitForChild(Dragon, "RightLegWeld") waitForChild(Dragon, "RightArmWeld") waitForChild(Dragon, "LeftArmWeld")
local lWing = Dragon.LeftWing local rWing = Dragon.RightWing local lWeld = Dragon.LeftWingWeld local rWeld = Dragon.RightWingWeld local raWeld = Dragon.RightArmWeld local laWeld = Dragon.LeftArmWeld local llWeld = Dragon.LeftLegWeld local rlWeld = Dragon.RightLegWeld
local drakone = Instance.new("Model") drakone.Name = "Drakone"
local drakoneClone
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil and player ~= nil then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function getMassOfObject(obj) local children local mass = 0 if type(obj) == "userdata" then children = obj:GetChildren() elseif type(obj) == "table" then children = obj end if children then for i = 1, #children do if children[i]:IsA("BasePart") then mass = mass + children[i]:GetMass() end if #children[i]:GetChildren() > 1 then mass = mass + getMassOfObject(children[i]) end end end return mass end
function flapWings() print("Flappy") local lWeld local rWeld local sign = 1 local count = 0
local initLC1 local initRC1
if drakone then local dragon = drakone:FindFirstChild("Dragon") if dragon then print(1) lWeld = dragon:FindFirstChild("LeftWingWeld") rWeld = dragon:FindFirstChild("RightWingWeld") if lWeld and rWeld then initLC1 = lWeld.C1 initRC1 = rWeld.C1 while drakone.Parent and drakoneClone and lWeld and rWeld do lWeld.C1 = lWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, -sign * math.pi/30) rWeld.C1 = rWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, sign * math.pi/30) count = count + 1 if count > 6 then sign = sign * -1 count = count%6 end wait(0.1) end end end end end
function setTransparency(value) if value == nil then value = 0 end Dragon.Transparency = value local children = Dragon:GetChildren() for i = 1, #children do if children[i] and children[i]:IsA("BasePart") then children[i].Transparency = value end end end
function blow(fireball, hit) if hit and hit.Parent and fireball then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end end
function animateBody() if drakone.Parent and drakoneClone then local ra = drakoneClone:FindFirstChild("RightArmWeld") local la = drakoneClone:FindFirstChild("LeftArmWeld")
local rl = drakoneClone:FindFirstChild("RightLegWeld") local ll = drakoneClone:FindFirstChild("LeftLegWeld")
local initRA = ra.C1 local initLA = la.C1 local initRL = rl.C1 local initLL = ll.C1
local duration = 1.5 local sign = 1
while duration do ra.C1 = ra.C1 * CFrame.Angles(sign * math.pi/360, 0, 0) la.C1 = la.C1 * CFrame.Angles(sign * math.pi/360, 0, 0) rl.C1 = rl.C1 * CFrame.Angles(-sign * math.pi/360, 0, 0) ll.C1 = ll.C1 * CFrame.Angles(-sign * math.pi/360, 0, 0) duration = duration - wait() end
print("Resetting") ra.C1 = initRA la.C1 = initLA rl.C1 = initRL ll.C1 = initLL end end
function shoot(direction) if drakoneClone == nil then return end shootSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("ShootSound") shooting = true --coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(animateBody)) --wait(1.25) if shootSound then shootSound:Play() end
local spawnPos = drakoneClone.Position + direction * 3.0
local fireballC = fireball:Clone() fireballC.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction) fireballC.Velocity = direction * 60.0
local float = Instance.new("BodyForce") float.force = Vector3.new(0, fireballC:GetMass() * workspace.Gravity, 0) float.Parent = fireballC
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = fireballC fire.Color = Color3.new(0, 153/255, 0) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(102/255, 51/255, 0)
fireballC.Parent = game.Workspace
fireballC.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(fireballC, hit) end) debris:AddItem(fireballC, 5.0) wait(1.0) shooting = false end
function attack() if myHumanoid == nil then return end if myHumanoid.Health < prevHealth and drakoneClone and not attacking and myTorso then prevHealth = myHumanoid.Health local tag = myHumanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag and tag.Value then local playr = tag.Value if playr:IsA("Player") then local character = playr.Character if character and (character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")) then attacking = true local torso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") print(1) if drakoneClone then for i = 1, 6 do shoot((torso - drakoneClone.Position).unit) wait(0.2) end end attacking = false end end end end end
function follow() local stopped = false local bv if drakoneClone then bv = drakoneClone:FindFirstChild("FollowBV") end while drakoneClone and drakone and myTorso and bv do local distance = (myTorso.Position - drakoneClone.Position).magnitude if distance > 5.0 then stopped = false if drakoneClone then drakoneClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(drakoneClone.Position, myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(0, drakoneClone.Position.Y - myTorso.Position.Y, 0)) if drakoneClone then bv.Parent = drakoneClone end if distance > 8.0 then bv.velocity = (myTorso.Position - drakoneClone.Position).unit * 20.0 + Vector3.new(0, 2, 0) else bv.velocity = (myTorso.Position - drakoneClone.Position).unit * 20.0 * (distance/24) + Vector3.new(0, 2, 0) end end else if not stopped then stopped = true bv.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) drakoneClone.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) bv.Parent = nil end end wait() end if drakone then drakone.Parent = nil end if drakoneClone then drakoneClone:Destroy() end SetTransparency(0) end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
if drakone.Parent ~= nil and drakoneClone then local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - drakoneClone.Position).unit shoot(direction) else
drakoneClone = Dragon:Clone() drakoneClone.Name = "Dragon" drakoneClone.Parent = drakone
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, getMassOfObject(Tool) * workspace.Gravity, 0) floatForce.Name = "Float" floatForce.Parent = drakoneClone
local bv = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bv.Name = "FollowBV" bv.Parent = drakoneClone bv.maxForce = Vector3.new(50000, 50000, 50000) bv.P = 50000
drakone.Parent = vCharacter
drakone:MoveTo(myTorso.Position + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 5.0)
setTransparency(1)
healthConnect = myHumanoid.HealthChanged:connect(attack)
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(follow))
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(75.0) if drakone then if drakone:FindFirstChild("Dragon") then drakone.Dragon:Destroy() Tool.Enabled = false wait(9.0) Tool.Enabled = true setTransparency(0) end end end))
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(flapWings)) end
wait(4) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() -- Horrendous is the name, for these checks if lWeld then lWeld.Parent = Dragon end if rWeld then rWeld.Parent = Dragon end
if rlWeld then rlWeld.Parent = Dragon end
if llWeld then llWeld.Parent = Dragon end
if raWeld then raWeld.Parent = Dragon end
if laWeld then laWeld.Parent = Dragon end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end
function onUnequipped() if drakoneClone then drakoneClone:Destroy() end if drakone.Parent then drakone.Parent = nil end setTransparency(0) prevHealth = 100 end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
